comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: F. O. Hellstrom was a North Dakota politician, a Democrat who was a delegate to the 1916 Democratic National Convention.  He was also the warden of the North Dakota State Penitentiary.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for your information about F. O. Hellstrom.  I found a bit more by searching Google Books, where the Britannica Year Book for 1913  (p. 882) says that Frank O. Hellstrom, Democrat of North Dakota ran for governor of the state, but was defeated by the Republican candidate.  Other books available such as the Annual Report of the North Dakota Public Service Commission (1906-1907) include correspondence from him signed as the Warden of the North Dakota State Peniteniary at Bismarck.  We will add some more details when we update.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_O._Hellstrom
